SEARCH
Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelController.controller.access

Class SignUpController

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelController.controller.access.SignUpController
public class SignUpController extends Object
This controller manages all the buttons selected in SignUpView EventHandler goToLoginView: if you click on the backButton you go back to the LoginView EventHandler goToSelection:if you click on the signUpButton , you go to the SubscriptionSelectionView if you want to sign in as a manager, or you go to the CustomerView if you want to sign up as a customer
